title: Get MOT reminders

introductory_paragraph.content:
Sign up to get reminders by email when your MOT is due.

You'll get an email:

- one month before your MOT is due
- 2 weeks before your MOT is due, if you still haven't had it tested

Sign up to get reminders by email when your MOT is due.

You’ll get an email:

  • one month before your MOT is due
  • 2 weeks before your MOT is due, if you still haven’t had it tested

more_information.content:
You need the vehicle's number plate (registration number).

## Vehicles you can't get reminders for

You can't get reminders for a vehicle that:

- has never had an MOT
- doesn’t have a current MOT
- needs an [annual test](/annual-test-for-lorries-buses-and-trailers) instead of an MOT, such as lorries, buses and coaches
- needs more than one MOT a year, such as taxis


## Stop getting reminders 

You have to unsubscribe to stop getting emails for a vehicle you've: 

- sold
- transferred to someone else
- scrapped or written-off
- registered as off the road

Use the unsubscribe link in the original confirmation email or any reminders you've been sent.

You need the vehicle’s number plate (registration number).
